    • ICD10分类

Create age specific rate.

create_age_rate.Rd

Create age specific rate.

create_age_rate(
  data,
  ...,
  event = fbs,
  rks = rks,
  agegrp = agegrp,
  type = "long",
  mp = 1e+05,
  decimal = 2
)

Arguments

data

Data frame of class 'fbswicd'.

...

Variable name used for stratification.

event

Event used for age specific rate.

rks

Risk population.

agegrp

Variable name indicate age groups.

type

Data frame format long or wide.

mp

Correction factor.

decimal

Decimal places for rounding.

Value

Return a data frame of age specific rate.
